{"id":870665868,"question_id":15,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2Â years, 1Â month","timestamp":1672773232,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1121 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/870665868/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"18.1 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        res=[]\n\n        for i in range(len(nums)-1):\n            if i>0 and nums[i]==nums[i-1]:\n                continue\n            l=i+1\n            r=len(nums)-1\n\n            while l<r:\n                sum1=nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]\n                if sum1<0:\n                    l+=1\n                elif sum1>0:\n                    r-=1\n                else:\n                    res.append([nums[i],nums[l],nums[r]])\n                    l+=1\n                    while nums[l]==nums[l-1] and l<r:\n                        l+=1\n\n        return res\n\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
